details: Can be stacked up to 3 times, once for each unique Explorer Thief to reach Master Level

info: To create one, choose the 'Explorers' option in the Character Creation screen and then continue through the story until you reach the town Lith Harbor where Sugar has a quest called 'The Adventure Begins'. Accept the quest and choose the option 'Thief' when prompted

Continue with the story until Lv. 30 as a Thief and talk to Dark Lord to accept a quest called 'The 2 Paths of the Thief'. Complete the quest by choosing the option Bandit and you will be on the path to a Shadower. Bandit is the 2nd job of Shadower

build: -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
-> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> -> ->
details: All 1st to 4th Job skills can be maxed
Put one SP into each skill first and then max each skill in this order
For any skills that have prerequisites, follow them first before following build path

hyperBuild.recommended:
• Meso Explosion - Reinforce and Enhance
  • Assassinate - Reinforce, Boss Rush, and Guardbreak

nodeInfo.recommended:
Bossing Trio
Mobbing Trio
  • Either categories can be maxed first based on if you prioritize bossing or mobbing
  • Any combination of these skills are good but preferred from same category so that the skills boosted match your priorities
  • 4 Boost Nodes total are needed to reach Master Level 60 for these skills (with Matrix Points used)
    • Nodes with the same Main Skill (skill at the top) cannot be equipped at the same time

content.specialThanks: Special thanks to Poro and the members of the Shadower Discord for their help in making this overview!
credits: Boost Nodes Build + Hyper Passive Build

extraContent.title: Dark Sight
extraContent.content:
Credits to the Night Walker Discord for the list of attacks avoidable with Dark Sight. For an actively maintained version, please check out the Night Walker Discord

In 1st Job, Dark Sight is unlocked that allows you to dodge certain attacks. Below is a list of avoidable attacks that have been tested:

BossAvoidable Attack
All EnemiesTouch Damage
HillaLightning Bolt, Flame Breath
CygnusAll minions (including instructors) touch damage + attacks
Princess No(Miroku/4F - All attacks except Infinite Flame), Butterfly Throw (except Black Butterfly Seduce), Sakura Shower
MagnusImmobilizing Gas, Falling Debris, Dash
PapulatusHand Smash, Floor Rift, Timed Cursed/Seal (both cast + seal), Falling Debris
GolluxReverse/99% Bomb
Crimson QueenBurn DoT (gain stacks but no damage taken)
PierreFalling Hats, Fire Spin (Blue Form)
Von BonFalling Debris
VellumFalling Stun Rocks
Pink Bean (Statuses)All attacks except Laser, Poison Clouds, Mini Pink Beans
Pink BeanBlue ground attack, Big Bang, Mini Pink Beans
LotusFalling Debris (except platforms), Green Vaccum (prevents slow/grounding)
DamienYellow(p1)/Red(p2) Falling Fireballs, Dash(p2), Thorn Bind (Can be done reactively when he disappears w/ Monster Silhouettes enabled in settings)
WillP1 (Segment Test) Red Meteors, P2 Web, P2 Dash
Guardian Angel SlimeSlime Pool DoT, Slime minion touch damage (not their attacks, i.e. Pink Slime's seduce), Magma Slime touch + landing on head
Verus HillaCorpse DoT
GloomFalling Debris
DarknellDebris (Both Vertical + Horizontal), Small Minion touch damage (except sword swing)
Black MageP1 Knights' Dash (still applies curse), P1 Red Lightning, Falling Debris (Vertical), Diagonal/Rolling Debris (only while midair), P3 Down FMA
SerenDash, Falling Debris (P1, P2 Sunset); still adds sun gauge
Kalos P1Bombs

primary.name: Three Snails
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 7, Damage 40
primary.desc: Throws a snail shell forward that deals fixed amount of damage

primary.name: Recovery
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 15, Recover 72 HP over 30 sec

primary.name: Nimble Feet
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 10, Duration 12, Movement Speed: 20

primary.name: Maple Return
primary.shortDesc: Returns you to Southperry Harbor on Maple Island.\nCooldown: 600 sec

primary.name: Echo of Hero
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Attack Power and Magic ATT: +4%, Duration: 40 min
details: To obtain this skill, complete the quest 'An Arrangement from the Goddess'
Affects all nearby players
Has a cooldown (2 hrs)

primary.name: Double Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Damage: 165%, Number of Attacks: 2, Enemies Hit: 5
primary.desc: Stab inplace damaging enemies around you
details: Only usable when equipped with a Dagger

primary.name: Lucky Seven
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 14, Throwing Star Cost: 2, Damage: 110%, Enemies Hit: 5, Number of Attacks: 3
primary.desc: Throws a barrage of stars forward
details: Only usable when equipped with a Claw

primary.name: Haste
primary.shortDesc: Speed: +40, Jump: +20, Max Speed: +20

primary.name: Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 5, hides in the shadows for 200 seconds.\nWhen Dark Sight is deactivated, cooldown increased per attack dodged: 3 seconds. Stacks up to 5 times.
primary.desc: While active, you cannot hit or be hit by enemies
details: While active, pressing the Skill Key again or using an attack will cancel Dark Sight
You can use while in Dark Sight
Has a cooldown (3 secs, stacks up to 5 times) per attack dodged

primary.name: Flash Jump
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 12, jumps further, able to use 2 times consecutively.
primary.desc: Double jump skill
details: Can be assigned a Key Slot or activated by pressing jump twice
Can be used twice in a row

primary.name: Nimble Body
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 20

primary.name: Savage Blow
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, attack 6 enemies with 210% damage 3 times.
primary.desc: Slashes forward several times

primary.name: Critical Edge
primary.shortDesc: Critical Rate: +25%, Critical Damage: +5%

primary.name: Steal
primary.shortDesc: Grants attack skills a 10% chance to steal a potion that instantly restores HP or MP. Consuming a potion that was stolen from a boss fully restores both HP and MP, and grants you a buff that increases your Attack Power by 30 for 3 minutes.
primary.desc: While toggled, grants your attack skills a chance to restore HP or MP
details: If the effect was triggered on a boss, you recover both HP and MP plus you gain a flat Attack buff
Can only trigger this effect once per enemy

primary.name: Agile Daggers
primary.shortDesc: Attack Speed: +2, Luck: +20

primary.name: Channel Karma
primary.shortDesc: Attack +30, Knockback Resistance: +40%

primary.name: Dagger Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Dagger Mastery: +50%

primary.name: Physical Training
primary.shortDesc: Permanently increases LUK by 30 and DEX by 30

primary.name: Shield Mastery
primary.shortDesc: When shield or dagger scabbard is equipped, DEF: +110%, Avoidability: +20%, Attack Power: +15, Damage Taken: -60%

primary.name: Bandit's Agility
primary.shortDesc: Allows you to Flash Jump upwards
primary.desc: Up jump skill
details: Can be activated in the air while pressing the Up Arrow Key and Jump Key together

primary.name: Midnight Carnival
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 26, attack 8 enemies with 190% damage 4 times
primary.desc: Releases a barrage of slashes forward

primary.name: Phase Dash
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 45, attack 8 enemies with 420% damage 2 times
primary.desc: Dashes forward while pushing back enemies

primary.name: Meso Explosion
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Damage: 100% and Number of Attacks: 2 per Meso per enemy, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Max Number of Projectiles: 15
primary.desc: Causes Mesos dropped by to seek out and damage nearby enemies

primary.name: Dark Flare
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, summon a dagger, for 60 sec., that periodically deals 360% damage to 3 enemies nearby. Cooldown: 60 sec.
primary.desc: Creates a damaging field
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Pick Pocket
primary.shortDesc: Has a 30% chance to drop Mesos, up to a maximum of 15 Mesos.\nMesos do not drop from Venom or Sudden Raid, which do damage over time.
primary.desc: While toggled, your attacks have a chance to drop Mesos which are used by
details: Mesos do not drop from summoning skills, 5th Job Common Skills, damage over time, and
Cannot be used at the same time as

primary.name: Shadow Partner
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 64, summons a shadow that makes an additional hit that is 70% of the final damage for all attacks for 200 sec.
primary.desc: Creates a clone that mimics your attacks, increasing the number of hits you deal per attack
details: The clone's attack deals reduced %Final Damage
Does not mimic , summoning skills, and 5th Job Common Skills

primary.name: Advanced Dark Sight
primary.shortDesc: 15% chance to maintain Dark Sight on attacking. When inside your own Smokescreen or Shadow Veil, this increases to 100%.\n15% chance to auto-trigger Dark Sight, Final Damage +15% when attacking during Dark Sight.\nIf you dodge an attack that deals damage proportional to Max HP, using the Dark Sight that activates when you are hit, the Dark Sight's remaining time will be reduced by 20% of its maximum.
primary.desc: During , using attacks has a chance to not deactivate the buff. Additionally, when you are hit, there is a chance to automatically activate
details: While in the automatic , if you dodge an attack that deals %Max HP, the duration is reduced slightly and the cooldown will not apply
Additionally, you gain increased %Final Damage while in

primary.name: Into Darkness
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 20. Teleport to an enemy within range and go into Dark Sight. Cooldown shared with Dark Sight.
primary.desc: Teleport to an enemy within range and activates
details: Shares cooldown with

primary.name: Venom
primary.shortDesc: Status Chance: 30%, Damage Over Time: 90% damage every 1 sec for 6 sec
primary.desc: Grants a chance for your attacks to apply a poisoning debuff

primary.name: Meso Mastery
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +25, Enemy Meso Drop Rate: +20%\nMeso Explosion Damage (per shot): +20%p

primary.name: Enveloping Darkness
primary.shortDesc: Max HP: +20%, Abnormal Status Resistance: +30, Elemental Resistance: +30%

primary.name: Assassinate
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 44, Damage: 270%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 6, Press the skill key once more to deal 490% damage 6 times as the final blow.\nFinal Damage increases by 50% when using a final blow that consumes the Murderous Intent buff.
primary.desc: Strikes an enemy several times before unleashing a devastating attack
details: Assassinate has two attacks, the initial strike and pressing the Skill Key again will activate the final blow
While casting, you are immune to being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)
Final blow deals increased %Final Damage when Murderous Intent is active and consumes the buff

primary.name: Cruel Stab
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 40, Damage: 250%, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 6\n[Passive Effect: Final Damage: +25%]
primary.desc: Stab forward
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Final Damage
Has a reduced chance to drop Mesos from

primary.name: Blood Money
primary.shortDesc:
Your attacks have a 30% chance of dropping coins. A total of 15 coins can be in play at any one time.
Damage-over-time effects from Venom and Sudden Raid do not generate coins.
Casting Meso Explosion while Blood Money is active grants the Muderous Intent buff. Meso Explosion deals 30% additional damage against bosses.
[Passive Effects] Luck +10, Critical Damage: +20%.
primary.desc: While toggled, your attacks have a chance to drop red coins which are used by
details: [Passive]: Permanently increases %Crit Damage and grants flat LUK

While active, grants the Murderous Intent buff and deals increased %Boss Damage
  • Targets bosses first with the highest HP
Coins do not drop from summoning skills, 5th Job Common Skills, damage over time, and
Cannot be used at the same time as
Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Sudden Raid
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 290, Damage: 494%, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Number of Attacks: 7, Damage Over Time: 210% damage every 1 sec for 10 sec, Cooldown: 30 sec
primary.desc: Unleashes a devastating large attack that applies a damaging debuff
details: Unaffected by Damage Reflect

primary.name: Maple Warrior
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 60, Increases all stats assigned APs by 15% for 900 sec

primary.name: Smokescreen
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 46, Critical Damage within the Smokescreen: +20%, Damage Taken in Proportion to Max HP: -10%,\nDuration: 30 sec, Cooldown: 150 sec
primary.desc: Creates a smokescreen where party members cannot be hit by enemy attacks
details: will not deactivate while attacking within the smokescreen
Increased chance for to activate while within the smokescreen

For attacks that deal %Max HP damage, the damage will be reduced
  • Smokescreen can also block certain key boss attacks such as Lotus' lightning floor & purple orbs and Will's screen crack
Enemies within the smokescreen take increased %Crit Damage
While casting, you are immune to being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

primary.name: Hero's Will
primary.shortDesc: MP Cost: 30, Cooldown: 300 sec
primary.desc: Removes certain abnormal status effects and become immune to Abnormal Status for 3 secs
details: Unaffected by Combat Orders

primary.name: Shadower Instinct
primary.shortDesc: Attack Power: +50, Final Damage: +15%, Ignore DEF: +20%

primary.name: Shadow Shifter
primary.shortDesc: Dodge Chance: 45%, Knockback Resistance: +60%

primary.name: Toxic Venom
primary.shortDesc: Poison Chance: 50%, 160% damage every 1 sec for 8 sec, can be stacked 3 times
details: Increases debuff chance, duration, and %Damage
Can now be stacked (up to 3 times)

primary.name: Dagger Expert
primary.shortDesc: Dagger Mastery: +70%, Attack Power: +40, Critical Damage: +15%
details: Increases %Weapon Mastery provided
Now grants flat Attack and increases %Crit Damage

hyperPassive.name: Meso Explosion - Enhance
hyperPassive.shortDesc: Max number of usable Mesos dropped from Pick Pocket and Blood Money: 5. Chance for Mesos to drop from Pick Pocket and Blood Money: +10%.

hyperActive.name: Flip of the Coin
hyperActive.shortDesc: When you land a critical attack, obtain a buff with Damage: +5%, Critical Rate: +5%. Max Stacks: 5.
hyperActive.desc: While active, whenever you land a Critical Hit, gain a stacking buff of %Damage and %Crit Rate (up to 5 times)

hyperActive.name: Shadow Veil
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 800%, Duration: 12 sec.\nCooldown: 60 sec
hyperActive.desc: Creates a large damaging field of slashing blades
details: will not deactivate while attacking within the veil
Increased chance for to activate while within the veil

hyperActive.name: Epic Adventure
hyperActive.shortDesc: MP Cost: 100, Duration: 60 sec, Damage: +10%\nApplies to any Explorer class in the party\nCooldown: 120 sec.

fifthMain.name: Shadow Assault
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 300, Max Enemies Hit: 10, Rush Damage: 1220%, Number of Attacks: 6, Critical Rate: +25%, Enemy DEF Ignored: +100%\nAttacks up to 4 times in the direction of your choice\nCan be used 2-4 times, with a 60 sec cooldown that starts after the first hit
fifthMain.desc: Dashes towards a chosen direction while damaging enemies in your path
details: Attack has increased %Crit Rate and 100% Ignore DEF
Pressing the desired Arrow Keys along with the Skill Key will dash towards that direction, including diagonal directions

Can be used up to 4 times and the cooldown starts after the initial cast
  • If the skill is off cooldown and is casted again before all the charges are used, you regain maximum charges and the cooldown is applied again

fifthMain.name: Trickblade
fifthMain.shortDesc: Passive Effect: The last enemy hit with Assassinate and Sonic Blow receives a wound debuff, for 10 sec., that can stack up to 3 times. Only 1 enemy can receive the wound debuff. If the debuff is given to a new enemy, the previous debuff disappears.\nActive Effect - MP Cost: 650, summons your hidden friends to deal 1100% damage up to 10 enemies 5 times. Cooldown: 14 sec.\nIf one of the enemies has the wound debuff at max stack, you can use it by linking from Assassinate's last attack and Sonic Blow to move behind that enemy and activate Chase Cut 5 times dealing 1350% damage 7 times with Critical Rate +100% and ignoring 100% additional Defense. Invincibile for 1.8 sec after the attack, which also applies 20 sec. of cooldown.
details:
[Passive]: Enemies hit by the final attack of or receive a stacking debuff (up to 3 times) that is consumed by Trick Blade
  • Only 1 enemy can receive the debuff at a time

If an enemy has the debuff at max stack, you can link or together with Trick Blade to dash behind that enemy and deal a devastating attack
  • The attack instead deals heavy damage to that one target and gains 100% Crit Rate and 100% Ignore DEF
  • You are also briefly invincible after the attack however the skill has a longer cooldown
  • Unaffected by Attack Ignore and Damage Reflect

fifthMain.name: Sonic Blow
fifthMain.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 1000, Duration: 2.5 sec, Damage: 1000% damage, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Number of Attacks: 7, Ignore DEF: +100%
Every attack of Sonic Blow stacks 3 wound debuffs on the highest Max HP enemy that was hit.
Cooldown: 45 sec.
Attack can be canceled by using Trickblade if there is an enemy with max wound stacks. Reduces cooldown by 2.5 sec. for every remaining number of attacks.
fifthMain.desc: Unleashes a barrage of slashes in front of you
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF and applies wound debuff from to the enemy with the highest Max HP

Attack can be cancelled by using or
  • Cooldown will be reduced based on how many number of attacks remain
While casting, you are immune to being knocked back at all (Super Knockback Resistance)

fifthMain.name: Slash Shadow Formation
fifthMain.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, Max Enemies Hit: 6, Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 8. Allies appear 12 times then the leader appears. Additional DEF Ignored: 100%\nLeader: Chase Cut Activation: 4, Max Enemies Hit: 8, Damage: 1250%, Number of Attacks: 15\nCooldown: 90 sec.
fifthMain.desc: Over a few seconds, shadows appear and slashes through enemies around you before dealing a devastating final blow
details: Attack has 100% Ignore DEF
When used with or , there is no casting animation and can be used at the same time
While active, pressing the Skill Key again will end the attack early and deal the devastating final blow
Unaffected by Damage Reflect and

masteryCore.name: 1st Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Assassinate
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 57, Damage: 395%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 6, Press the skill key once more to deal 690% damage 6 times as the final blow.\nFinal Damage increases by 50% when using a final blow that consumes the Murderous Intent buff.\nEnhances to HEXA Pulverize every 10 sec.
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Pulverize
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 57, Damage: 480%, Number of Consecutive Attacks: 6, Press the skill key once more to deal 835% damage 6 times as the final blow.
Final Damage increases by 50% when using a final blow that consumes the Murderous Intent buff.
Upon use, Dark Sight Duration: 6 sec
Cooldown: 10 sec
Using Shadow Veil increases the number of uses by 2, using Smokescreen increases the number of uses by 3, maintaining for 3 sec within Smokescreen charges the number of uses by 1, Max Number of Charges: 5
details: Unlocked with 1st Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: 2nd Mastery Node
details: Requires enhanced with V Matrix at least Lv. 40 (before Matrix Points) to unlock

masteryCore.name: HEXA Meso Explosion
masteryCore.shortDesc: MP Cost: 35, Damage: 300% and Number of Attacks: 2 per Meso per enemy\nMax Enemies Hit: 10, Max Number of Projectiles: 15
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

masteryCore.name: HEXA Meso Explosion
masteryCore.shortDesc:
MP Cost: 35, Damage: 300% and Number of Attacks: 2 per Meso per enemy
Max Enemies Hit: 10, Max Number of Projectiles: 15
Boss Damage: +40%
Grants the Murderous Intent buff.
details: Unlocked with 2nd Mastery Node

originSkill.name: Halve Cut
originSkill.shortDesc: MP Cost: 1200, invincible during casting\nMax Enemies Hit: 15, Damage: 960%, Number of Attacks: 6, Chase Cuts: 23. Damage: 782%, Number of Attacks: 6, Chase Cuts: 32. Damage: 850%, Number of Attacks: 7, Finishing Blows: 55\nCooldown: 360 sec

meta: Shadower is a LUK thief class part of the Explorers. Shadower utilize Daggers as their primary weapons. For their secondary weapon, Dual Blade can equip Dagger Scabbards and Shields
